name: GCU Recycler
description:
This game is a simple score attack style game that I made for my University dissertation. All you have to do is sort the rubbish into the correct bins. You can play as long as you like but the bin will eventually overflow. Unfortunately I don't have the Unity project anymore so cannot resolve any bugs. Please do feel to leave some comments with your constructive criticisms.

The art of the hero in the game came from  a poster detailing the recycling systems at the University I attended.
